mdRecord.dcterms:title: Headquarters Second Brigade, First Cavalry Division, Middle Military Div., Nov. 6, 1864: Soldiers: The Brevet Brigadier-General Commanding feels that he should not allow the present opportunity to pass without referring to and recalling the operations of his brigade during the late engagements / Signed, Thomas C. Devin, Brevet Brigadier-General
Soldiers: The Brevet Brigadier-General Commanding feels that he should not allow the present opportunity to pass
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Devin, Thomas C. (Thomas Cassimer), 1822-1878
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In script, except for printed signature.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. McGregor Fund, 2003/2004.
